title: Something seems wrong with dependency on duecredit
body:
Reinstalled datalad in dev virtualenv for datalad-hirni. Right after installation it now can't load the entrypoints for datalad-neuroimaging and datalad-hirni due to missing duecredit. Suggests to me that something is wrong with the dependency declaration.

```bash
% pip install -e ~/Development/datalad
Obtaining file:///home/ben/Development/datalad
Requirement already satisfied: appdirs in ./venv-dev/lib/python3.5/site-packages (from datalad==0.12.0rc2) (1.4.3)
Requirement already satisfied: chardet>=3.0.4 in ./venv-dev/lib/python3.5/site-packages (from datalad==0.12.0rc2) (3.0.4)
Requirement already satisfied: GitPython>=2.1.8 in ./venv-dev/lib/python3.5/site-packages (from datalad==0.12.0rc2) (2.1.11)
Requirement already satisfied: iso8601 in ./venv-dev/lib/python3.5/site-packages (from datalad==0.12.0rc2) (0.1.12)

Requirement already satisfied: boto in ./venv-dev/lib/python3.5/site-packages (from datalad==0.12.0rc2) (2.49.0)
Requirement already satisfied: msgpack in ./venv-dev/lib/python3.5/site-packages (from datalad==0.12.0rc2) (0.6.1)
Requirement already satisfied: requests>=1.2 in ./venv-dev/lib/python3.5/site-packages (from datalad==0.12.0rc2) (2.21.0)
Requirement already satisfied: keyring>=8.0 in ./venv-dev/lib/python3.5/site-packages (from datalad==0.12.0rc2) (18.0.0)
Requirement already satisfied: keyrings.alt in ./venv-dev/lib/python3.5/site-packages (from datalad==0.12.0rc2) (3.1.1)
Requirement already satisfied: jsmin in ./venv-dev/lib/python3.5/site-packages (from datalad==0.12.0rc2) (2.2.2)
Requirement already satisfied: PyGithub in ./venv-dev/lib/python3.5/site-packages (from datalad==0.12.0rc2) (1.43.5)
Requirement already satisfied: simplejson in ./venv-dev/lib/python3.5/site-packages (from datalad==0.12.0rc2) (3.16.0)
Requirement already satisfied: whoosh in ./venv-dev/lib/python3.5/site-packages (from datalad==0.12.0rc2) (2.7.4)
Requirement already satisfied: gitdb2>=2.0.0 in ./venv-dev/lib/python3.5/site-packages (from GitPython>=2.1.8->datalad==0.12.0rc2) (2.0.5)
Requirement already satisfied: monotonic>=0.1 in ./venv-dev/lib/python3.5/site-packages (from fasteners->datalad==0.12.0rc2) (1.5)
Requirement already satisfied: pbr>=0.11 in ./venv-dev/lib/python3.5/site-packages (from mock>=1.0.1->datalad==0.12.0rc2) (5.1.3)
Requirement already satisfied: idna<2.9,>=2.5 in ./venv-dev/lib/python3.5/site-packages (from requests>=1.2->datalad==0.12.0rc2) (2.8)
Requirement already satisfied: certifi>=2017.4.17 in ./venv-dev/lib/python3.5/site-packages (from requests>=1.2->datalad==0.12.0rc2) (2018.11.29)
Requirement already satisfied: urllib3<1.25,>=1.21.1 in ./venv-dev/lib/python3.5/site-packages (from requests>=1.2->datalad==0.12.0rc2) (1.24.1)
Requirement already satisfied: entrypoints in ./venv-dev/lib/python3.5/site-packages (from keyring>=8.0->datalad==0.12.0rc2) (0.3)
Requirement already satisfied: secretstorage; sys_platform == "linux" and python_version >= "3.5" in ./venv-dev/lib/python3.5/site-packages (from keyring>=8.0->datalad==0.12.0rc2) (3.1.1)
Requirement already satisfied: pyjwt in ./venv-dev/lib/python3.5/site-packages (from PyGithub->datalad==0.12.0rc2) (1.7.1)
Requirement already satisfied: Deprecated in ./venv-dev/lib/python3.5/site-packages (from PyGithub->datalad==0.12.0rc2) (1.2.5)
Requirement already satisfied: smmap2>=2.0.0 in ./venv-dev/lib/python3.5/site-packages (from gitdb2>=2.0.0->GitPython>=2.1.8->datalad==0.12.0rc2) (2.0.5)
Requirement already satisfied: cryptography in ./venv-dev/lib/python3.5/site-packages (from secretstorage; sys_platform == "linux" and python_version >= "3.5"->keyring>=8.0->datalad==0.12.0rc2) (2.6.1)
Requirement already satisfied: jeepney in ./venv-dev/lib/python3.5/site-packages (from secretstorage; sys_platform == "linux" and python_version >= "3.5"->keyring>=8.0->datalad==0.12.0rc2) (0.4)
Requirement already satisfied: cffi!=1.11.3,>=1.8 in ./venv-dev/lib/python3.5/site-packages (from cryptography->secretstorage; sys_platform == "linux" and python_version >= "3.5"->keyring>=8.0->datalad==0.12.0rc2) (1.12.2)
Requirement already satisfied: asn1crypto>=0.21.0 in ./venv-dev/lib/python3.5/site-packages (from cryptography->secretstorage; sys_platform == "linux" and python_version >= "3.5"->keyring>=8.0->datalad==0.12.0rc2) (0.24.0)
Requirement already satisfied: pycparser in ./venv-dev/lib/python3.5/site-packages (from cffi!=1.11.3,>=1.8->cryptography->secretstorage; sys_platform == "linux" and python_version >= "3.5"->keyring>=8.0->datalad==0.12.0rc2) (2.19)
Installing collected packages: datalad
  Found existing installation: datalad 0.12.0rc2
    Uninstalling datalad-0.12.0rc2:
      Successfully uninstalled datalad-0.12.0rc2
  Running setup.py develop for datalad
Successfully installed datalad
ben@tree ~/cbbs_imaging/datalad-hirni
 % python -m nose -s -v datalad_hirni  
[WARNING] Failed to load entrypoint hirni: The 'duecredit' distribution was not found and is required by datalad [__init__.py:resolve:786] 
[WARNING] Failed to load entrypoint neuroimaging: The 'duecredit' distribution was not found and is required by datalad [__init__.py:resolve:786] 
```

Apart from that, the comment in setup.py doesn't make a lot of sense to me:
> 'duecredit',  # needs >= 0.6.6 to be usable, but should be "safe" with prior ones


We do bother to possibly depend on sth, that we know won't be usable? Either there's more to that comment or we should specify the version we need, or not call it a dependency at all, if we are fine with it not being useable.
